sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import './Scoreboard.css' import { AiOutlineHome, AiOutlineEye } from 'react-icons/ai' import { BiReset } from 'react-icons/bi' import { BsShare } from 'react-icons/bs' import quizContext from '../../context/quizContext' import { Link as ReachLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Scoreboard = (props) => { const context = useContext(quizContext) const { setNext, setScore, setAnswerList } = context const { total_que, correct_que, wrong_que } = props let percentage = (correct_que / total_que) * 100 let Attempted = (correct_que + wrong_que) / total_que * 100 const handleGoHome = () => { window.location.reload() } const handlePlayAgain = () => { setNext(0) setScore({ 'rightAnswers': 0, 'wrongAnswers': 0 }) setAnswerList([]) } return ( <>
Your Score
{percentage.toFixed(2)} %
Attempted
{Attempted.toFixed(2)}%
Total Questions
{total_que}
Correct
{correct_que}
Wrong
{wrong_que}
Home
Share Score
Review Answer
Play Again
) } export default Scoreboard
